entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Gatineau
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:27 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 1.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Gatineau Airport 03:00 AM EDT Friday 24 March 2023
Temperature: 1.6°C
Pressure: 101.3 kPa
Humidity: 66 %
Dewpoint: -4.1°C
Wind: WNW 10 km/h
Air Quality Health Index:

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 2. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending early this evening then mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High plus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 4. Wind chill minus 6 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clearing. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 13 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Thursday 23 March 2023
